thread.title: Jones Named National Sales Manager for PFO Global
thread.title_full: Jones Named National Sales Manager for PFO Global

title: Jones Named National Sales Manager for PFO Global
text: Wednesday, September 30, 2015 12:18 AM Christina Jones.​ IRVING, Texas—Prescription lens, finished eyewear and vision technology provider, PFO Global, Inc. , (OTCBB: ENRG) announced that it has named 26-year industry sales veteran Christina Jones as its national sales manager. The announcement was made at its recently hosted national sales meeting held at its corporate headquarters here. Prior to moving to this newly created position, Jones was a sales consultant with PFO Global. Jones will lead the PFO Global sales team nationwide, and will be responsible for meeting with key account holders and suppliers to assure customer satisfaction, quality assurance, product offering and price guarantees."PFO Global is an emerging disruptive force in the industry giving its customers a unique innovative way to grow their businesses by offering them products of the highest quality at a price where they can greatly improve their profit margin,” Jones said. “Our sales team is on a mission to get the word out about our exciting new products, our commitment to reinvent customer service, and our desire to help our partners grow," said Jones. ALSO RECOMMENDED
